name: Whittier Cafe
notes: Whittier Cafe is a cozy neighborhood spot in Denver’s Five Points area that blends the feel of a community living room with the flavors of African-inspired coffee and snacks. Guests can sip coffee, tea, wine, or beer on the patio, grab a light bite, or settle in to work or catch up with friends. With vegetarian options and a welcoming atmosphere, it’s a favorite gathering place for locals who want good drinks, simple food, and a strong sense of community.
